mapper.insert: insert into ASSIGNCOM (ASSIGNCOM_ID, ASSIGNCOM_NAME, ASSIGNCOM_CON, ASSIGNCOM_JOBCATEGORY, ASSIGNCOM_JOBS, ASSIGNCOM_SAL, ASSIGNCOM_REMARKS) values (assigncom_seq.nextval, #{assigncomName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assigncomCon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assigncomJobcategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assigncomJobs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assigncomSal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{assigncomRemarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update ASSIGNCOM set ASSIGNCOM_NAME = #{assigncomName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ASSIGNCOM_CON = #{assigncomCon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ASSIGNCOM_JOBCATEGORY = #{assigncomJobcategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ASSIGNCOM_JOBS = #{assigncomJobs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ASSIGNCOM_SAL = #{assigncomSal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ASSIGNCOM_REMARKS = #{assigncomRemarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ASSIGNCOM_ID = #{assigncomId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum,e.* from assigncom e order by assigncom_id desc) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
